text: Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Eee! Ia ongani? Ia uaghan akar kam deravɨra a gɨfozir puvatɨ? Ia bizir kam gɨfo? Daghetam guizbangɨra gumazimɨn navir averiamɨn magɨrɨgh ikeghan kogham. Da an navimɨn aven magɨrɨgh, egh an muriamɨn magɨrɨghtɨma a gɨn dar aviam. Kamaghɨn gumazim apir bizitam azenan ikegh an akam ko muriamɨn magɨrɨgh, an muriam damightɨma a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzeghan kogham.” (Iesusɨn akar gavgavim kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, dagheba bar Godɨn damazimɨn bar zue. Ezɨ e dar amam.)
